articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Kim Il Sung's Statues
articles.content:
Past news






Floral Baskets Laid before Kim Il Sung's 
Statues   Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets 
were laid before the statues of President Kim Il Sung Thursday, the lunar New 
Year's Day.     An endless stream of servicepersons, working 
people, school youth and children and overseas compatriots visited his statues 
in Pyongyang and different areas of the country.     Floral 
baskets were laid before his statue on Mansu Hill.     Seen 
before the statue was a floral basket sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
    Floral baskets were placed before the statue in the name 
of the party and armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions, KPA 
units, organs, enterprises, factories, farms and schools at all levels in 
Pyongyang, the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic 
Front, etc.     Written on the ribbons of the floral baskets 
were letters "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Live Forever," "The 
Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be with Us," etc. 
    The crowds paid homage to the President in humble 
reverence.     Floral baskets were also laid before his 
statues in Pyongyang and local areas. 



Music Concert Held on Lunar New Year's Day 
   Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A music concert 
celebrating the lunar New Year's Day, 2008 was held at the Moranbong Theatre 
Wednesday.     Appreciating the concert were senior party and 
state cadres, officials of party organs, working people's organizations, 
ministries and national institutions, and creators, artistes and journalists in 
the fields of culture and art and media.     It was performed 
by female soloists of Pochonbo "Unhasu" and musicians of the State Symphony 
Orchestra, a prestigious art troupe.     Their repertoire 
included piano concerto "Song Devoted to Comrade Kim Jong Il," orchestra 
"Thunder on Jong Il Peak," orchestra and female soprano trio "The Glow over 
Kangson," orchestras "Unforgettable Echo of Lagoon Samil" and "Firm 
Determination," female sopranos "My Star" and "Spinning Ballad" and string 
ensemble for pizzicato "How Wonderful This Land Is." 



People from All Parts of Country Enjoy Lunar New Year's Day 
   Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The people across the 
country significantly celebrated the pleasant lunar New Year's Day. 
    Colorful performances and gatherings took place at art 
theatres and schoolchildren's halls in various provinces on the lunar New Year's 
Day.     The performers there successfully represented 
through graceful and beautiful dances and peculiar melodies of folk instruments 
and folk songs the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who 
brought back the soul of the nation once eclipsed amidst the storm of the times. 
    National folk games of schoolchildren took place at Kim 
Il Sung Square and the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace in the capital city. 
Hamhung Square in South Hamgyong Province was animated with games that drew 
20,000 schoolchildren. Folk amusement games of working people and children 
including Yut game, swinging, seesaw and peasant dances were held in Jagang, 
South Phyongan, Kangwon Provinces and other parts of the country. 
    Meanwhile, public catering facilities such as restaurants 
which specialize in national dishes and souvenir kiosks were busy serving 
working people and school youth and children on the lunar New Year's Day. 



Gathering Celebrating Lunar New Year's Day 
Held   Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A gathering 
celebrating the lunar New Year's Day "We Have Nothing to Desire More in the 
World" was held at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Thursday on the 
occasion of the lunar New Year's Day.     The palace was 
splendidly decorated by electronic devices depicting Kimilsungias and 
Kimjongilias, the immortal flowers, and magnolias, letters "A Happy Lunar New 
Year," "Year of Jubilee of National History," "Congratulations," etc., large 
gates built with pine twigs and festive lanterns.     
Attending the gathering together with schoolchildren were party, army and state 
senior cadres, the chairman of a friendly party, officials of party, armed 
forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national 
institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, officials in the 
fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, 
bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, persons of merit, working people in 
Pyongyang, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National 
Democratic Front, delegations and visiting groups of overseas Koreans and 
compatriots visiting the socialist homeland.     Present 
there on invitation were diplomatic envoys, staff members of foreign embassies 
and representatives of international organizations here.     
Schoolchildren extended lunar New Year greetings to Kim Jong Il in humble 
reverence when the stage turned into a veritable sea of flowers and dancers. 
Through female chorus "New School Uniforms Given by 
Marshal," male solo "General Represents the Whole World," etc. the performers 
emphasized the fact that Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is always with schoolchildren 
as the Korean people are led by Kim Jong Il.     Also put on 
the stage were high-pitched flute solo "My Best Country," accordion concert "May 
Snow Fall on Lunar New Year's Day," dance and story-telling by Korean 
schoolchildren in Japan "We Will Defend Our School to the Last," chorus "Three 
Million Youngsters Are United as One" and other colorful numbers making a 
successful ideological and artistic representation of the happy life of 
schoolchildren and their firm pledge to give steady continuity to the tradition 
of Mt. Paektu, believing in Kim Jong Il only. 



Kim Jong Il Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian 
   Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim 
Jong Il was so kind as to send a birthday spread to Pak Hwak Sil living in 25th 
neighborhood unit of Thapje-dong No. 1, Taedonggang District, Pyongyang, who 
greeted the centenary of birth under the benevolent socialist system. 
    She was born in February of 1908 as a daughter of 
drudger's family of Pyongyang. In her early days she lost her parents and could 
not but lead a miserable life, subjected to all sorts of humiliation and insult 
as part of the stateless nation.     After the liberation of 
the country she could enjoy a genuine life. She devoted her wisdom and 
enthusiasm to the construction of the country. She performed labor feats in the 
construction of the capital as a highly skilled plasterer during the postwar 
period of rehabilitation, in particular.     As a pensioner, 
she has enjoyed a happy life for over 40 years, benefiting from the popular 
healthcare policy of the Workers' Party of Korea.     Free 
from an unbalanced diet, she keeps herself optimistic, mixing with neighbors. 
She is still good at seeing, hearing and speaking and even does kitchen chores. 



Joint Military Exercises to Be Staged in S. Korea 
   Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korea-U.S. 
"Combined Forces Command" announced on Feb. 1 that "Key Resolve-Foal Eagle 08" 
joint military exercises will be staged from March 2 to 7 throughout south 
Korea, according to a news report.     The "Combined Forces 
Command" disclosed that the joint military drills are to involve equipment, 
capability and manpower in all aspects as they consist of the combined command 
drill and combined field mobile exercise to be staged under such diverse 
conditions as reception of U.S. reinforcements from outside of the Korean 
Peninsula, its staging and onward movement and integration. 
    The trigger-happy elements claim that the joint military 
maneuvers are aimed at examining the military preparedness focused on defence 
and they are not of provocative nature.     The codename "Key 
Resolve," a version of "RSOI and Foal Eagle" was contrived by the U.S. to calm 
down the public censure and condemnation at home and abroad that they are 
intended to unleash a war to invade the DPRK. This codename itself assumes very 
belligerent and provocative nature as it is designed to lead a war to victory 
through the effective deployment of the U.S. reinforcements in the event of 
contingency.     The joint military exercises are, therefore, 
nothing but saber rattling to invade the north as is the case with "RSOI" and 
the "Foal Eagle" in every respect. 



Security Authorities' Suppression of Movement for Reunification Denounced in 
S. Korea   Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The People's 
Solidarity for Abolition of the "National Security Law" (NSL) and the Teachers' 
Trade Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) reportedly called a joint press conference 
in Seoul on February 1 at which they denounced the security authorities for 
their crackdown upon the movement for reunification .     At 
the conference speakers accused the security authorities of recently detaining 
Kim Hyong Gun, chairman of the reunification committee of the North Jolla 
Provincial Branch of Jongyojo, on charge of violation of the NSL, declaring that 
lurking behind this is a sinister intention to obliterate the education in the 
issue of reunification.     The security authorities working 
hard to deny the June 15 joint declaration, in particular, are unpardonable, 
they said, stressing the need to put an end to the tragic reality in which the 
movement for reunification has become a target of suppression. 
    A press release read out at the conference warned that if 
the security authorities continue cracking down upon the movement for 
reunification, failing to face up to the truth of history, they will certainly 
meet strong resistance of all people. 



Birthday of Kim Jong Il Celebrated in Different 
Countries   Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Seminars, 
round-table talks, friendship meeting, film shows and book and photo exhibitions 
took place in Egypt, the Czech Republic, Laos and South Africa from January 27 
to 30 on the occasion of the birthday of Kim Jong Il.     On 
display in the venues of the functions were works of President Kim Il Sung and 
Kim Jong Il, photos showing their immortal Songun leadership exploits and books 
and photos introducing Songun Korea.     The chairman of the 
Misr Arab Socialist Party of Egypt and other members of its leadership said at a 
seminar that the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il is a just policy helping 
all countries defend their sovereignty and one for the world peace-loving people 
to learn from as it is the most effective policy in the present times. 
    The chairman of the Nymburk County Committee of the 
Communist Party of Czech and Moravia and the executive secretary of the Central 
Committee of the Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association noted at 
the round-table talks that the signal successes achieved in socialist Korea are 
the great fruition of the Songun policy, Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
    The secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of 
the South African Communist Party said at a film show that the human cause of 
independence against imperialism is sure to triumph as it is led by Kim Jong Il 
possessed of the world-startling rare wisdom and leadership ability. 
    Participants of the film shows watched Korean films 
including "They Are Together on the Way of Great Songun Leadership" and "The 
75th Founding Anniversary of the Heroic Korean People's Army." 



Kim Jong Il Praised by Egyptian   Pyongyang, 
February 7 (KCNA) -- Ahmad Hassan, general secretary of the Nasser Arab 
Democratic Party of Egypt, issued a statement on January 30 on the occasion of 
the birthday of Kim Jong Il.     In the statement he praised 
Kim Jong Il as the most distinguished leader in the present times as he is 
absolutely trusted by the Korean people.     Kim Jong Il has 
performed great feats in the work for the prosperity of the country and nation 
with his outstanding leadership, the statement said, adding that his wise 
leadership is given to all domains of social development in the DPRK including 
politics, military, economy and culture.     It expressed 
firm belief that Kim Jong Il would lead the Korean people to victory in their 
building of a great prosperous powerful nation and their cause of national 
reunification with his extraordinary ideological and theoretical wisdom and 
original political mode. 



Korean People's Greatest National Holidays to Be Observed in 
Bangladesh   Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A 
Bangladeshi national preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun 
and February 16 and the 60th founding anniversary of the DPRK was inaugurated 
with due ceremony in Dhaka on January 27 under the co-sponsorship of the 
Workers' Party of Bangladesh and the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity 
Committee.     At the ceremony Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of 
the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, was elected adviser 
to the preparatory committee and Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh 
People's League, its chairman.     It decided to widely 
introduce the greatness and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il 
through media and organize colorful functions on the above-said occasions. 



Significant Commemoration of Day of Sun Called for by Pakistani Organization 
   Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) – The Pakistan-Korea 
Friendship Association made public an appeal to the organizations for friendship 
and solidarity with the DPRK in different countries of the world on January 25 
on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.     The appeal said 
that the distinguished feats of President Kim Il Sung are always remembered by 
all revolutionaries and peoples in the world for their immortality and 
historical significance, stressing the association decided to commemorate the 
Day of the Sun with great enthusiasm.     It called on all 
organizations for friendship and solidarity with the DPRK in different countries 
of the world to form preparatory committees, make public function programs and 
significantly commemorate the Day of the Sun this year and in the year 2012 
through diverse activities to glorify the exploits of the distinguished leader 
including seminars, round-table talks, exhibitions and publication of books. 



For Spanish-speaking people





Rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung con motivo del Ano Nuevo 
Lunar   Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 
primero de enero segun el calendario lunar, los oficiales y soldados del 
Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares y coreanos 
residentes en ultramar rindieron homenaje hoy al Presidente Kim Il Sung ante sus 
estatuas de bronce erguidas en la capital y localidades del pais. 
    �@Ante la estatua de bronce en la capitalina colina Mansu 
se distinguia un cesto de flores enviado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, 
Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de 
Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante 
Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.     �@Fueron 
depositados igualmente los cestos de flores a nombre de los organismos del 
partido, las fuerzas armadas, los ministerios, los organos centrales, las 
unidades del EPC, y de los organismos a todos los niveles, empresas, fabricas, 
granjas y escuelas en la ciudad de Pyongyang, asi como de la sucursal del Frente 
Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.     �@En 
las cintas de los cestos se leian: "Sera inmortal el gran Lider, camarada Kim Il 
Sung", "El gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung estara para siempre con nosotros", 
etc.     �@Tras depositarlos, los participantes en esta 
ceremonia rindieron tributo al Presidente. 



Ofrecido concierto por el Ano Nuevo 
Lunar   Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el 
dia 6 en el Teatro Morambong el concierto por el Ano Nuevo 2008 segun el 
calendario lunar.     Lo disfrutaron los cuadros del partido 
y el Estado, los funcionarios del partido, organizaciones de masas, ministerios 
e instituciones centrales, creadores, artistas y periodistas de los dominios de 
cultura y arte, de prensa e informacion.     En la ocasion 
actuaron las solistas del grupo "Unhasu" de la banda musical Pochombo y los 
ejecutantes de la prestigiosa Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional. 
    En la escena fueron presentados el concierto para piano 
"Himno al camarada Kim Jong Il", la musica orquestal "Trueno del pico Jongil", 
la musica orquestal y trio de sopranos "El crepusculo de Kangson", la musica 
orquestal "Inolvidables ecos del lago Samil" y "Me marcho dejando aqui mi alma", 
el soprano "Mi estrella" y "Tharyong sobre rueca", la orquesta de cuerda "Es 
mejor este territorio" y otras piezas. 



Panorama de Pyongyang en el Ano Nuevo 
Lunar   Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ATCC) -- Hoy es el 
primero de enero segun el calendario lunar, fiesta tradicional del pueblo 
coreano.     En todas las avenidas capitalinas adornadas en 
colores de fiesta se respiran la idiosincrasia y los habitos folcloricos de la 
nacion coreana.     Los capitalinos iniciaron esta jornada 
rindiendo tributo al Presidente Kim Il Sung, eterno Sol del Juche y fundador de 
la Corea socialista, en el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan o ante sus estatuas de 
bronce erguidas en la colina Mansu y otros lugares.     
Varios lugares de esta capital, entre otros, la Plaza Kim Il Sung y las 
explanadas frente al Arco Triunfal y al Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang estan 
congregados los ninos escolares en vestimentas nacionales divirtiendose con 
juegos folkloricos como la cometa, el volante, la peonza, el trineo, el 
molinete, etc.     Este peculiar panorama hace recordar a los 
pasajeros de su infancia.     Tambien resultan espectaculares 
los juegos de Yut, ajedrez y el concurso culinario que se entablan por unidad de 
organos, empresas y familias.     Citada por la Agencia 
Telegrafica Central de Corea, Ri Sun Hui (de 80 anos de edad), quien reside en 
el municipio de Pothonggang, dijo que cada primero de enero lunar significa para 
las amas de casa una oportunidad para medir sus habilidades culinarias. 
    Hay un dicho antiguo del pueblo coreano, segun el cual, 
para lograr la abundante cosecha y tener buena salud en un ano es preciso 
llenarse de los platos sabrosos en su primer dia, senalo.     
�@Continuo que los coreanos comparten con los familiares, parientes y vecinos los 
platos de fiesta como chaltok (pastel de harina de arroz glutinoso), sirutok 
(torta cocida a vapor), tokguk (trozos de arroz en caldo), jijim (fritura), 
sanjok (carne asada en broqueta), yakgua (pastilla de harina, miel, aceite, 
etc.) y kangjong (turron).     Segun esta costumbre 
tradicional, este ano tambien nuestros familiares y parientes nos reunimos con 
diversos platos preparados con esmero y pasamos alegres momentos saboreandolos, 
finalizo.     Por otra parte, en la red de servicios 
gastronomicos de la capital se ofrecen el fideo en caldo y el arroz cocido en 
sopa caliente, comidas tipicas de Pyongyang, que acentuan el clima festivo.
